name: Moon Warbles
description:
Welcome to Moon Warbles!

Score goals to get weapons which will allow you to destroy your enemies.

The green ball will determine in which goal you are supposed to score. Hit the ball using your bat. You will be rewarded with weapons through scoring!

[ We didn't have enough time to finish the game. However, feel free to smack some robots around with the bat. It's fun.]

(Controls: W A S D to move around
Mouse left/right click to shoot guns and swing the bat
Space bar to jump)
